name: Project C - ITGDev
description:
Project C for MFF UK Gamedev course

Work in progress game project for ITGDev MFF UK course - Project C!

Current files:

Crater_Run_wipBuild4.zip - build 4 of P. C.

Crater_Run_wipBuild5.zip  - latest build of P.C.

Controls:

Left and right mouse buttons -> fire primary / secondary guns

arrow keys / AWSD - movement

escape - pause menu
